TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Tomiyac, title = Tomiyac, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tomiyac} }

S.FORM: alang Tomiyac ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Cinkong Song, kwara sali buwan nya ga 168 buwan, 404 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 88% kyan ku 354 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 12% kyan ku 50 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Amis 81%, binah lihuyan s'uli 7%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Tomiyac hya' ga Sa'aniwan. tay mkyahu' na Tomiyac hya' ga Dadowacen. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Tomiyac ga niya mki sko Tayto Keng ato Cinkong Song, kwara sali bowan nya ga 168 bowan, 404 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 88% kyan ko 354 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 12% kyan ko 50 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Amis 81%, binah lihoyan s'oli 7%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Tomiyac hya' ga Sa'aniwan. tay mkyaho' na Tomiyac hya' ga Dadowacen. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
